instructions:
Process tomatoes to a puree and set aside. Process the pickles to a fine chop. Combine with tomatoes and
remaining ingredients. Chill and serve. Makes about 3 pints.
ingredients: 2 cans (15 oz ea) tomatoes, with liquid
1 1/2 cups bread and butter pickles, with juice
1 can (6 oz) minced clams, with liquid
6 dashes Tabasco sauce or to taste
name: Gazpacho - Slang Jang
creator: Jan Decker
